string-array.item:
Android App Components and Data Persistence

Assignment: 1

Skeleton Version: 1.0

This assignment introduces the concept of Intents and shows how they can be used for a one-way exchange information between Android Activities.

Android App Components and Data Persistence

Assignment: 2

Skeleton Version: 1.0

This assignment introduces the concept of using intents for two-way communication between Activities. It builds upon assignment 1 by starting the image download activity for results. The download image activity will have to be modified to return the downloaded image URL in a data intent so that the main activity will be able to display it in an image view widget.

Android App Components and Data Persistence

Assignment: 3

Skeleton Version: 1.0

This assignment introduces the concept of using a broadcast intent for two-way communication between Activities. It builds upon assignment 1 by having the MainActivity register as a local BroadcastReceiver. The MainActivity then starts the DownloadActivity to download an image after which, the DownloadActivity returns this path to the downloaded image by broadcasting a result intent back to the MainActivity. The MainActivity then displays the received image file in an ImageView.
